snippet: Manhattan School of Music students performed Schubert’s one-act opera “Die Verschworenen,” a singspiel that became popular years after his death.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Manhattan School of Music production of Schubert's one-act opera Die Verschworenen.
lead_paragraph: Manhattan School of Music students performed Schubert’s one-act opera “Die Verschworenen,” a singspiel that became popular years after his death.

headline.seo: Schubert’s ‘Verschworenen’ at Manhattan School of Music
headline.main: We’ll Sing and We’ll Spiel, but No Sex Till War Ends
headline.print_headline: We’ll Sing and We’ll Spiel, But No Sex Till War Ends
